9_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8.body:

>   "body": "Articles about Bitcoin, Torrent and Peer To Peer networks", 
>   "added": 1436262090, 
>   "type": "group", 
>   "topic_id": 1, 
>   "title": "P2P news flow"
> }, 
> you probably have to go to your user folder manually and add the "type": "group", to your data.json
> nano data/1TaLkFrMwvbNsooF4ioKAY9EuxTBTjipT/data/users/1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8/data.json
